dk15:7: evaṁ mayā śrutam ekasmin samaye bhagavāṁś chrāvastyāṁ viharati jetavane ’nāthapiṇḍadasyārāme | tatra bhagavān bhikṣūn āmantrayate sma | yasya kasya cid bhikṣavaḥ paṁca bhayāni vadyāni vairāṇi aśāntāni bhavanti sa dṛṣṭa eva dharme vijñānāṁ garhyo bhavati paścāc cānutāpyaḥ kāyasya ca bhedāt paraṁ maraṇād apāyadurgatiṁ vinipātaṁ narakeṣūpapadyate |
dk15:8: katamāni paṁca bhayāni vadyāni vairāṇy aśāntāni bhavanti |
dk15:9: yat prāṇātipātikaḥ prāṇātipātapratyayaṁ vadyaṁ vairaṁ prasavati prāṇātipātād aprativiratasya evam asyedaṁ prathamaṁ bhayaṁ vadyaṁ vairam aśāntaṁ bhavati |
dk15:11: surāmaireyamadyapramādasthāyikaḥ surāmaireyamadyapramādasthānabhayaṁ vadyaṁ vairaṁ prasavati surāmaireyamadyapramādasthānād aprativiratasya evam asyedaṁ paṁcamaṁ bhayaṁ vadyaṁ vairam aśāntaṁ bhavati |
dk15:12: yasya kasya cid imāni paṁca bhayāni vadyāni vairāṇy aśāntāni bhavanti sa dṛṣṭa eva dharme vijñānāṁ garhyo bhavati paścāc cānutāpyaḥ | kāyasya bhedāt paraṁ maraṇād apāyadurgatiṁ vinipātaṁ narakeṣūpapadyate |
dk15:13: yasya tu kasya cit paṁca bhayāni vadyāni vairāṇi śāntāni bhavanti sa dṛṣṭa eva dharme vijñānāṁ praśasyo bhavati paścāc ca nānutāpyaḥ kāyasya ca bhedāt sugatau svargaloke deveṣūpapadyate |
dk15:14: katamāni paṁca bhayāni vadyāni vairāṇi śāntāni bhavanti |
dk15:15: yat* prāṇātipātikaḥ prāṇātipātapratyayaṁ bhayaṁ vadyaṁ vairaṁ prasavati prāṇātipātāt prativiratasya evam asyedaṁ prathamaṁ vadyaṁ vairaṁ śāntaṁ bhavati |
dk15:17: surāmaireyamadyapramādasthāyikaḥ surāmaireyamadyapramādasthānapratyayaṁ bhayaṁ vadyaṁ vairaṁ prasavati surāmaireyamadyapramādasthānāt prativiratasya evam asyedaṁ paṁcamaṁ bhayaṁ vadyaṁ vairaṁ śāntaṁ bhavati |
dk15:18: yasya kasya cid imāni paṁca bhayāni vadyāni vairāṇi śāntāni bhavanti sa dṛṣṭa eva dharme vijñānāṁ praśasyo bhavati paścāc ca nānutāpyaḥ kāyasya ca bhedāt sugatau svargaloke deveṣūpapadyate | idam avocad bhagavān | idam uktvā sugato hy athāparam etad uvāca śāstā ||
dk15:20: yaḥ prāṇam atipātayati mṛṣāvādaṁ ca bhāṣate |
dk15:21: loke adattam ādatte paradāraṁ ca gacchati |
dk15:22: surāmaireyapānaṁ ca yo naro hy adhigṛdhyati |
dk15:23: saktaḥ paṁcasu dharmeṣu duḥśīla iti kathyate |
dk15:25: yas tu prāṇaṁ nātipātayati mṛṣāvādaṁ na bhāṣate |
dk15:26: loke adattaṁ nādatte paradāraṁ na gacchati |
dk15:28: muktaḥ paṁcasu dharmeṣu śīlavān iti kathyate |
